product_name: adidas Terrex Windstopper Fast Jacket - Men's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: With maximum breathability and windproof, water-resistant protection, this Windstopper soft shell combines the comfort of a soft mid layer and the weather resistance of a shell in a single garment.
short_description: With maximum breathability and windproof, water-resistant protection, this Windstopper soft shell combines the comfort of a soft mid layer and the weather resistance of a shell in a single garment.
